primitiveValues.textValue: Have you uploaded your wire receipt? Desktop Wire

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Have you uploaded your wire receipt? Desktop Wire

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
• Login to http://ndax.io
  • Once you log in, you will be redirected to your dashboard
  • Click Deposit located at the top of the page
  • Select WIRE TRANSFER, if you're depositing USD, select United States Dollar first, then Receive,
  • Copy the information provided and initiate a wire transfer from your online banking platform's website or in the branch with the information provided
  • Once you send the wire transfer from your financial institution, click on Upload A Receipt located at the bottom of the page
  • Enter your FULL NAME and AMOUNT as it shows on the wire receipt, then upload your copy of the wire transfer receipt
  • Click on SUBMIT once finished
